scripts.deploy-hosting-dev: npm run build && firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy-hosting-prod: mv .env temp.env && mv prod.env .env && npm run build && firebase use prod && firebase deploy --only hosting && firebase use dev && mv .env prod.env && mv temp.env .env
scripts.deploy-functions-dev: firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy-functions-prod: firebase use prod && firebase deploy --only functions && firebase use dev
